description: I really like it! it works smoothly and looks nice. would be cool if there was a destop layout too.

I'm suprised that Konqueror wasn't just ported to Plasma Mobile instead of developing a brand new web browser for the phone or even better, just port FireFox for Android but that's not to say that this is a bad piece of software, although the settings were a bit lackluster and there's no global menu support on desktop which is a bit of a shame...

It is a really good, and simple browser.
It is also very smooth, and looks nice.
It is also very customisable.
But when I installed it in manjaro, it had a missing library.
I had to install the package 'qcoro-qt5', in order to make it work.
Then it is flawless.
summary: Good, but had to install missing libs

description: The Angelfish Web Browser is a pretty good browser. It's most definitely not amaziing. I have used other browsers by KDE (such as Falkon) and the speed was a little bit faster, the performance was a little bit better. However, Angelfish is able to get the job done. Not Bad At All

Idealer Browser für mein Raspberry Pi Tablet (RasPad) mit Touchscreen und 
Bildschirm-Tastatur unter plasma-mobile!
need to work - small function -when open many sites it freeze to die And restart not help only reinstall
summary: Cool it is really fast on tablet - faster then all another browser +
